home.title: The Premium Marketplace for Graded Trading Cards
home.subtitle: Buy and sell authenticated graded slabs with confidence. Real-time certificate verification, escrow protection, and investment-grade analytics for serious collectors and investors.

home.secureTransactionsDesc: Escrow protection, insured shipping, and temperature-controlled delivery options for high-value items.
home.investmentAnalyticsDesc: Track price trends, market indices, ROI reports, and get price alerts on your watchlist items.

verification.title: Buyer Protection
verification.subtitle: Learn how to spot fake graded slabs and protect yourself from scams
verification.guideTitle: How to Spot Fake PSA Slabs
verification.guideSubtitle: A comprehensive guide to identifying authentic vs. fake graded cards
verification.introduction: Counterfeit graded slabs are becoming increasingly sophisticated. This guide will help you identify key signs of fake PSA, BGS, and other grading company slabs before making a purchase.
verification.platformProtectionTitle: How We Protect You on Slab Market
verification.platformProtectionDesc: At Slab Market, we take buyer protection seriously. Our platform includes multiple layers of security to ensure you're buying authentic graded cards from trusted sellers.
verification.sellerRatingsDesc: Every seller on our platform has a rating based on their transaction history. Check seller ratings and reviews before making a purchase to ensure you're buying from a trusted source.
verification.scammerProtectionDesc: Scammers and fraudulent sellers are immediately banned from our platform. We actively monitor for suspicious activity and take swift action against any fraudulent behavior.
verification.paymentProtectionDesc: If you report a scammer before payment is processed, we will immediately block the payment. Scammers never receive money from fraudulent transactions on our platform.
verification.reportSystemDesc: If you suspect a fake slab or fraudulent seller, report it immediately through our dispute system. Our team reviews all reports and takes appropriate action.
verification.escrowProtectionDesc: All transactions are protected by our escrow system. Funds are held securely until you confirm receipt and authenticity of your purchase.
verification.verifiedSellersDesc: Look for verified seller badges. These sellers have undergone additional verification and have a proven track record of authentic transactions.
verification.disputeResolutionDesc: Our support team is available to help resolve any disputes. If you receive a fake slab, we'll work with you to get a full refund and take action against the seller.
verification.howToReport: How to Report a Fake Slab
verification.howToReportDesc: If you receive a fake slab or suspect fraudulent activity:
verification.reportStep2: Provide photos and evidence of the fake slab
verification.reportStep3: Include the certificate number and transaction details
verification.reportStep4: Our team will investigate and take appropriate action
verification.reportStep5: You'll receive a full refund if the slab is confirmed fake
verification.protectionFeaturesDesc: Here's what makes Slab Market a safe place to buy graded cards:
verification.psaDescription: PSA (Professional Sports Authenticator) is one of the most popular grading companies. Here's what to look for when verifying a PSA slab:
verification.bgsDescription: BGS (Beckett Grading Services) uses a different slab design. Here are the key identifiers:
verification.cgcDescription: CGC (Certified Collectibles Group) has distinct features. Check these elements:
verification.certificateNumberDesc: Always verify the certificate number on the official grading company website. Fake slabs often use real certificate numbers from other cards.
verification.labelQualityDesc: Authentic labels have crisp, clear printing. Fake labels may appear blurry, pixelated, or have incorrect fonts.
verification.slabMaterialDesc: Real slabs use high-quality, durable plastic with specific thickness and clarity. Fake slabs may feel flimsy or have visible seams.
verification.hologramsDesc: Most grading companies include holograms or other security features. Check that these are present and match the official design.
verification.labelAlignmentDesc: Authentic labels are perfectly centered and aligned. Misaligned labels are a red flag.
verification.fontAndSpacingDesc: Compare the font, spacing, and formatting with official examples from the grading company's website.
verification.step1Desc: Enter the certificate number on the official grading company website to verify it matches the card.
verification.step2Desc: Look for crisp printing, correct fonts, and proper alignment.
verification.step3Desc: Check the thickness, clarity, and overall quality of the plastic slab.
verification.step4Desc: Look for holograms, watermarks, or other security features unique to the grading company.
verification.step5Desc: Compare the slab with official examples from the grading company's website or documentation.
verification.redFlag1: Certificate number doesn't match the card
verification.redFlag6: Seller refuses to provide certificate verification
verification.redFlag8: Visible seams or imperfections in the slab
verification.watchVideo1: Watch Video: How to Spot Fake PSA Slabs
verification.watchVideo2: Watch Video: Fake Slab Identification Guide
verification.contactSupport: If you're unsure about a slab's authenticity, contact our support team before making a purchase.
verification.reportFakeDesc: If you encounter a fake slab on our marketplace, please report it immediately.
